channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Job Portal -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-41786|2024-08-03T12:49:43.807Z -- wp%20job%20portal -- wp%20job%20portal%20%E2%80%93%20a%20complete%20job%20board
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WP Job Portal WP Job Portal – A Complete Job Board.This issue affects WP Job Portal – A Complete Job Board: from n/a through 2.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-35759|2024-06-21T14:00:51.786Z -- wp%20job%20portal -- wp%20job%20portal
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Job Portal allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Job Portal: from n/a through 2.1.3.
